Producer: Jason Blum, Alex Hyner, Bill Karesh, Alex Theurer
Screenwriter: J.D. Dillard, Alex Hyner, Alex Theurer
Rating: PG-13 (Some Bloody Images|Creature Violence|Brief Strong Language)
Synopsis: A shipwreck survivor on an uninhabited island must fend off a malevolent force that surfaces each night.
Title: Sweetheart
